The 'Qatar Open', currently known as the 'Qatar [[ExxonMobil]] Open' for
sponsorship reasons, is a professional tennis tournament played on outdoor hard
courts. It is currently part of the ATP World Tour 250 series of the Association
of Tennis Professionals (ATP) World Tour. It is held annually in January at the
Khalifa International Tennis and Squash Complex in Doha, Qatar, since 1993.
